drcl.net.traffic
Interface TrafficPeriodic

All Known Implementing Classes:
traffic_CDSmooth, traffic_ExpOnOff, traffic_OnOff, traffic_PacketTrain, traffic_ParetoOnOff, traffic_PeakRate, traffic_Periodic, traffic_Poisson, traffic_PoissonVariableSize, traffic_RTSmooth, traffic_TokenBucket
public interface TrafficPeriodic

Defines the periodic property of a traffic model. The traffic amount per period can be obtained by (getLoad() * getPeriod()).

Method Summary
 double getPeriod()
          Returns the period in second.
 

Method Detail

getPeriod

public double getPeriod()
Returns the period in second.
